mapper.insert: insert into tbl_booking ( userId, userNumber, sitterNumber, bookingDate, pickupAddress, ServicePrice, extraServicePrice, totalPrice, progressState ) values( #{userId}, #{userNumber}, #{sitterNumber}, now(), #{pickupAddress}, #{ServicePrice}, #{extraServicePrice}, #{totalPrice}, '예약중' );
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT extra.sitterNumber, extra.extraServiceType, extra.extraServiceName, extra.extraSerivcePrice, service.serviceType, service.servicePrice, sche.scheduleType, sche.startHour, sche.endHour FROM tbl_sitter_service service JOIN tbl_sitter_service_extra extra on service.sitterNumber = extra.sitterNumber JOIN tbl_sitter_schedule sche on sche.sitterNumber = extra.sitterNumber WHERE service.sitterNumber = #{sitterNumber};
select userId from tbl_user where userNumber = #{userNumber};
